a.n: Keane: Curate A Night For War Child

p.d: Indie rock favourites Keane, host an evening of music at London's Brixton Academy, to raise awareness for the War Child Charity. This concert recorded in November 2007, contains outstanding live performances by a fantastic line-up including the Guillemots, the Magic Numbers, Pet Shop Boys, Lily Allen and more. Also included is Keane's rousing cover of Queen's 'Under Pressure'.
